headline: 1 No-Brainer Dividend Stock to Buy in July for Passive Income
summary: Lockheed Martin has been lagging other major defense contractor stocks.  The stock's valuation is compelling and the dividend yield is generous.  Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) shares fell a whopping 10.8% this past Tuesday in response to the defense contractor's second-quarter 2025 earnings and updated guidance.
